challenge_info.description: Compile core definitions, frameworks, educational models, and key curricular innovations from foundational cybersecurity documents.

documents.title: NIST Cybersecurity Framework: Functions, Categories, and Implementation Tiers
Proposal of an Inclusive Cybersecurity Definition

job_to_be_done.task: Produce a structured answer containing essential definitions, main curriculum frameworks, strategies for course/module creation, and current best practices in cybersecurity education as extracted from these documents.
